lender.name: Janet

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I understand there are people that aren't as fortunate as others, and what most people spend daily in my country can make a incredible life-changing difference to someone in a third-world /developing country. Lately, I get overwhelmed thinking about giving back or donating my time because recently my own resources have been limited. This is really important to me, so I'm left to be creative to fulfill this goal of mine. This is an opportunity to utilize the power of one's network in order to make a difference. I hope to lead by example, and inspire others to do the same, as a friend has once done for me. Thank you for being a part of this experience.
lender.occupational_info: My line of work is service based, where I handle the booking of transportation (commercial trucks) to handle and deliver customers freight from point to point. This could involve specialized materials, such as steel, machinery, or even produce.

lender.name: Do projects.

lender.occupational_info: We think, write and make art about how cities work, how they're changing and how we can use them most creatively.

lender.name: Pete

lender.occupational_info: I want to support people who have the initiative and enthusiasm to change their lives.

lender.loan_because: I have received help over the years to achieve my own goals and want to pass that assistance on to others.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: It is such an important thing to do. It's wonderful helping other people achieve their goals.

lender.occupational_info: I worked for almost 40, most of my life. For my hard work i've become disabled. I worked full time in manufactoring. Now, maybe I can help in a small way someone else make a better future for themselves.

lender.name: Antti Salovaara
lender.loan_because: I loan because I hope that those who have been helped by these loans will in turn help others. At first, this help is given to those close by; in time it will extend to others further away. This is an easy, yet effective scheme for the whole of humanity: help others when you're able to and hope to receive help when you are in need. The easiest way to make this work is to take the first, small steps yourself.

lender.loan_because: we will give a helping hand for these people to find a way to help oneself; because we have only one life - just do it;

lender.occupational_info: I go to school, and make people's coffee.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have been reading about micro-financing for some time and had become interested in participating. Also having traveled the world through my job, I have been to places where a few dollars could really make a difference in the lives of people unlike in the USA and other supposed "civilised" societies where a few dollars could do little than keep you satisfied with coffee and a doughnut. I am hopeful that the last statement does not come across as demeaning, I only hope to express the sentiment that in other societies a dollar can go a lot further without all of the burden of red-tape that seems to keep our society bogged down and unresponsive to true entrepreneurship at the grass-roots level!
lender.occupational_info: I have been associated with the U.S. government in a contracting capacity and as such have had the opportunity to travel and live in all parts of the world.

The TV you watch is on Bitbop!

lender.occupation: Development Director, Food For Maine's Future
lender.loan_because: To lend is to give encouragement and applause; to remain silent is not an option.
lender.occupational_info: Food for Maine's Future seeks to build a just, secure, sustainable and democratic food system to the benefit of all Maine farmers, communities, and the environment. I create and implement funding opportunities and work to improve communication between small scale farmers and the public. I also work on policy development.

lender.name: The Pace Group
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to see others have opportunities.

lender.name: Dan Hemme
lender.loan_because: I have, and others do not.
lender.occupational_info: Recent graduate of UF - Sociology and Spanish - and heading off to Spain. (Hopefully) heading to law school and working in Environmental Justice in the future. In some country. Probably one that speaks Spanish.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: we all start somewhere...I'm glad to help.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Janelle

lender.occupational_info: I help people in times of need.

lender.name: Laura

lender.occupational_info: I really enjoy spending time at the beach, taking in the sun and the beautiful views. I also like to travel up and down the Florida coast.

lender.occupational_info: United States Marine Corps Officer and Gerontologist specializing in contracting and health care for the elderly.

lender.name: Andrew Halliday

lender.occupational_info: I research and work on sustainable land management and rehabilitation, to help make sure that we can keep growing what we need to feed, clothe and house people now and in the future

lender.occupational_info: Homes for sale in the Lafayette, LA area. The entire Realtors MLS database for Lafayette, Youngsville, and Broussard, Louisiana. Find your perfect home today.
